meta.title: Portfolio | MA
meta.content: This is the content of the home page.

about.about-me: I am a graduate Front-end developer from Noroff School of Technology and Digital Media, Norway. I am passionately engaged in coding and the challenges it presents. Much of my time is spent exploring and improving my skills in various programming languages. I am constantly working towards gaining more experience and hope to one day work as a full stack developer.
about.profile: I'm located in Norway and have been learning coding and exploring the developing world during my education of 2 years. I also intend to continue my education and been doing my own research to acquire the expertise to become a proffesional web developer.
about.skills: Languages and tools I work with:
about.skills-p: I primarily focus on developing dynamic and interactive web applications using React and Next.js. Design is also important to me, and I use tools like Figma and Tailwind CSS to create a good user experience (UX) and an attractive user interface (UI). Recently, I have also started exploring animations and 3D graphics with Anime.js and Three.js.

slides.byers: An e-commerce site built with React, Bootstrap, Sass, and Rest-api.
slides.holidaze: A front-end application for a booking site built with React, Bootstrap, Sass, and Rest-api.
slides.adventure: A responsive website for Adventure Trails Hikes built with HTML and CSS.
slides.noxB: An auction site where users can add and bid on items posted by other users.
slides.notebook: Eye-controlled virtual keyboard and calculator for disabled users built with Bootstrap and JS.
